name: phlebotomy technician schools
short_description: (Phlebotomy training) is the training that is given to individuals hoping to become phlebotomists. It could be given at different levels and in various colleges. Right now, there are hardly any organized phlebotomy academic institutions to quote phlebotomy technical assistant training, it is offered at recognised phlebotomy schools offering other medical courses.(National Phlebotomy Certification Agencies)Completing a phlebotomy program doesn’t automatically qualify graduates for phlebotomy employment. Nationally recognized certification is required by most employers; certification is also necessary by law in California and Louisiana.Phlebotomy Certification
